response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and my proposal aims to strike a balance that benefits us equally. I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a price of $950,000. This offer not only allows you to secure an asset that aligns perfectly with your needs and aspirations but also ensures a significant return on investment. I believe this price reflects the true worth of the product while providing you with a substantial discount compared to its market value. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of creating a mutually beneficial partnership.", "product_price": 950000}
